ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc70:0.5_0: The second training rule on sitting mats
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc70:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc70:1.2_0: At that time the nun Thullanandā gave the full admission to a disciple, but neither took her away nor had her taken away.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc70:1.3_0: And so her husband got hold of her.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc70:1.4_0: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized her,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc70:1.5_0: “How could Venerable Thullanandā give the full admission to a disciple, and then neither take her away nor have her taken away?
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc70:1.6_0: If this nun had gone away, her husband would not have gotten hold of her.” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc70:1.7_0: “Is it true, monks, that the nun Thullanandā didn’t do this?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc70:1.10_0: “... How could the nun Thullanandā not do this?
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc70:1.11_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc70:1.12_0: “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc70:1.13.1_0: ‘If a nun gives the full admission to a disciple, and then, even if she has her taken away, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc70:2.1.4_0: ...The nun who has been given the full ordination by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc70:2.1.10_0: she does not herself take her away.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc70:2.1.12_0: she does not ask anyone else to take her away.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc70:2.1.13_0: If she thinks, “I won’t take her away nor have her taken away, even just 65 to 80 kilometers,” then by the mere fact of giving up her duty, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc70:2.2.1_0: there is no offense for him.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc70:2.2.3_0: if she searches for a companion nun, but does not find one;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc70:2.2.7_0: if she is the first offender.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc70:2.2.8_0: The tenth training rule is finished.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc70:2.2.9_0: The seventh sub-chapter on pregnant women is finished.
